tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My dental history: I had two Root canal done by age of 18, The cap used to get out of its place like in 2-3 years in a row and my previous dentist used to do it for free but then suddenly after few years my cap came out and due to dentist not available I didn't go to him and then it just got delayed for two years to replace the same mostly due to time constraints in my job.
One day I saw this hoarding going up in khau gali of Ghatkopar East stating Gums and Braces which just gave click to my brain that I had root canal to be done. I remembered the opening date and decided to go after its fully functioning.

I just took appointment and went ahead. On the day of appointment there was call from dental clinic reminding the appointment. First good thing.

Secondly when I reached there, one assistant was ready with paper pen to fill in formalities form where you write your problems and medical history.

Third best thing,doctor was ready and I didn't have to wait for even a minute.

Overall treatment was satisfactory as
She explained everything in detail
Asked for opinions about which treatment should patient would like to go after proper explanation.
I was impressed **** *** ********* *** ****

I have changed my dental clinic. Will you ?
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We have loved having you as our patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Oh. Gums n Braces is a fab clinic. Both the Drs Sneh & Tuhina Mehta are too good.  I've  been their Patient for over 2yrs. I've  recommended  them to many of my friends. All of us are now their  regulars.
Treatment is good. Follow-up is excellent.
I would happily give them a five star rating

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: From a point where the pain was unbearable to the point of healthy teeth, Dr Sneha Mehta and her team helped me in every way possible. The procedure went as smooth as it could with minimal discomfort. Finally found a place where I could blindly rely on. Thank you doctor for making it seem easier.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Tuhina is very efficient at what she does and is very friendly. If you are someone who is scared of dental treatments and root canal, injections and doctors in general then you must visit her clinic, she will make you feel comfortable and calm instead of scarying you more. They use modern equipements and top notch materials in treatment which makes the whole experience much better for the patient.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Namaste dr.
That's words true ... DOCTOR IS GOD
treatment treat like MOTHER... 
" My mother is very sencitive she is aashthama paitiant .  At the time of treatment she feel very comfortable , me wahi tha .. meri MAA  ko ghabrahat bhi nahi huai ..."
clinic is very HYGINE
staff is very hygine and helpful

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Periodontal Flap Surgery with Bone grafting,
review:
Drs. Tuhina and Sneh Mehta are top class clinicians with a keen sense of  personal attention to their patients. They take time to explain their diagnosis, prognosis and recommended line of treatment, regularly using models to bring it all alive.
The clinic is not conveniently located vis-√°-vis my home but the quality of treatment is of such exceptional standards, I accept the inconvenience willingly. It's my teeth and gums. A little commute is more than worth the effort.
reply_text: Thank you so much.. Your trust means a lot to us!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Conservative Dentistry,Dental Deep Cleaning,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Dental Implant,
review: Very calm, friendly and patiently listened to my dental problems. Very nicely explained what was needed to be done. I needed small fillings and gum cleaning. Took time to make me comfortable (I have immense fear of dental drill) and even played music in the background to calm me down. Would certainly recommend to everyone.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words Richa!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mum had visited in March from UK for the implant surgery and root canal treatment. 
She was very impressed by cleanliness of the clinic and How well Dr sneh Mehta/Tuhina mehta taken care of her with the most highest regards. 
Our communication from the initiate stage of implant surgery and to the end was very well explained with details. mum felt so comfortable not once did any doctors made her feel out of her comfort zone! 
Highly recommended!!!
reply_text: Thank you so much Krunal.. Hope she is doing well !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: She was very gentle with her work and I experienced very little pain than expected. The filling were done so well. At the end of it I didn‚Äôt even realise which tooth is filled as the filling was done so well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The treatment was carried out well and without any complication. Being 70+ yrs in age, having other ailments and being a first time patient here, I was generally a bit hesitant. But Dr. Tuhina is communicative and considerate. We came to her as an emergency appointment and she was kind enough to accommodated us. I would certainly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Tuhina and Dr Sneh are very friendly. They explained the treatment process very well and patiently. At a doctor‚Äôs, patient comfort is of utmost importance. Having seen many dentists across different cities, there are hardly 1-2 places where I‚Äôve felt extremely comfortable and gums and braces is definitely one among them.

Needless to say, the atmosphere and staff were warm and welcoming too.
